name: ToEarnNow
description: The NOW Token is a utility token that can be used to exchange goods and services on the NOW Platform. NOW token has the goal of becoming the most widely used cryptocurrency in the world. To achieve this, the team is focusing on building partnerships with businesses and organizations that will help increase the use of NOW token. Additionally, the team is working on increasing the visibility of the currency by listing it on more exchanges and making it easier for people to purchase NOW token.
